channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Luxury Handbags with Radley
channel.desc: Treat yourself to a little luxury this season with Radley London's gorgeous bags and accessories. Discover on-trend totes, chic cross-bodies and much more in this showcase of covetable handbags.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Dyson
channel.desc: Vacuum your home with help from the iconic and much-loved British brand Dyson. We will be showcasing unique packages with added accessories, as well as discovering Dyson's new innovative technology.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Luxury Handbags with Radley
channel.desc: Treat yourself to a little luxury this season with Radley London's gorgeous bags and accessories. Discover on-trend totes, chic cross-bodies and much more in this showcase of covetable handbags.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Morning Show
channel.desc: Wake up to QVC! We've chosen products from across all our ranges to ensure there is something for everyone to enjoy. Tune in to see special guests too.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Practical Presents with Dyson
channel.desc: Find useful gifts for the whole family designed to make their lives easier in and around the home; ranging from personal care through to DIY, electronics, kitchen and housewares including Dyson.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Fragrance Hall
channel.desc: Discover your signature scent with this sweet-smelling show full of divine fragrances from some of the top perfume brands in the world, all at fantastic prices.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: What To Wear this Winter
channel.desc: Get ready for winter with QVC's fabulous fashion picks! Discover cosy coats, stylish knitwear and essential accessories to keep you warm and chic all season long.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Christmas Gifts with Radley
channel.desc: Treat them to something extra special this year with Radley's luxury handbags and accessories. From pretty purses to wow-worthy tote bags, discover gorgeous bags from this world-renowned brand.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Phase Eight
channel.desc: We're bringing the high street's fashion destination to your sofa with Phase 8's extensive range of sophisticated, high quality designs for all occasions, in a variety of feminine prints and colours.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Radley London
channel.desc: Radley fashion accessories provide an aspirational mix of style, attention to detail and desirability, offering designs for every occasion that make you look and feel fabulous.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Butler & Wilson Fashion Jewellery
channel.desc: Designed and made in London, this range of couture fashion jewellery by the renowned Simon Wilson includes larger-than-life crystal-set pieces.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Luxury Handbags
channel.desc: Discover a curated selection of designer handbags, as we showcase brands such as Osprey, Radley, Paul Costelloe and Aimee Kestenberg among others.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Snuggle up with Cozee Loungewear
channel.desc: Snuggle up at home during the chilly winter months with soft, warm loungewear from Cozee Home.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Cozee Home
channel.desc: Create a warm and cosy sanctuary in your home, with the Cozee Home range of snuggly bedding, throws and accessories offering comfort and coziness in your home.
